Package dev.lazurite.thimble.synchronizer

Class Synchronizer

java.lang.Object
dev.lazurite.thimble.synchronizer.Synchronizer
public class Synchronizer
extends java.lang.Object
This is the main class used to sync information across the client and the server. Each Composition object contains one of these.
Author:
Ethan Johnson

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Synchronizer.Entry<T>
    A helper class used to organize a composition of information which is mainly a key-value pair.
